DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see investigator help immune system work myeloma . Because cancer produce patient body , immune system easily recognize fight cancer cell . The immune system need `` trained '' . This disease select study Wilms Tumor 1 ( WT1 ) protein often present myeloma cell . WT1 gene involve normal development kidney organ . When WT1 gene become abnormal , make protein involve development cancer . This study determine whether WT1 vaccine cause immune response safe able keep myeloma come back .
DOC.brief_title: WT1 Analog Peptide Vaccine Patients With Multiple Myeloma Following Autologous Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic multiple myeloma , ISS stage 13 confirm diagnosis multiple myeloma MSKCC Patients must eligible undergo autologous stem cell transplantation standard institutional criterion Patients must document WT1 positive disease . For purpose study , define detectable presence WT1 expression immunohistochemistry WT1 transcript via RTPCR bone marrow plasma cellrelated biopsy specimen prior autologous stem cell transplantation . Bone marrow biopsy specimen time diagnosis patient diagnose MSKCC outside hospital may request assessment WT1 expression IHC Age > = 18 year Karnofsky performance status > = 50 % Hematologic parameter : Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) > = 1000/μl Platelets > 50k/ μl Biochemical parameter : Total bilirubin < = 2.0 mg/dl AST ALT < = 2.5 x upper limit normal Creatinine < = 2.0 mg/dl Pregnant lactate woman Patients active infection require systemic antimicrobial Patients take systemic corticosteroid Patients serious unstable medical illness Concurrent malignancy
